name: Just Another Day in Australia
description:
Stay alive in the Australian Outback for as long as possible by finding cans of fly spray to get rid of the pesky flies before they swarm you to death. At the same time, you must avoid the Australian wildlife; Funnel Web Spider, Brown Snake, Crocodile and Drop Bear(Koala), which all want to kill you.

It might sound bad, but it's just another day in Australia.
